description:
The commander of the Crossbone Vanguard`s elite Black Vanguard squadron. Zabine is a superb pilot and a clever tactician, and his rapid rise through the ranks has led many old-timers to resent him as an upstart. Though loyal to the Crossbone Vanguard, Zabine harbors secret ambitions of his own, and when he is assigned to train and protect Cecily he sees this as a perfect opportunity to work his way closer to the Ronah family.
Source: Official Site
name: Zabine Chareux
